H0.text: what type of government does france use. Federal Republic

H1.text: what type of government does france use. Constitutional Monarchy

H2.text: what type of government does france use. Parliamentary Democracy

H3.text: what type of government does france use. Unitary state

A4.text: The government must assume responsibility for its actions before the National Assembly, and the National Assembly can dismiss the government with a motion of censure.

A5.text: The prime minister must reflect the will of the majority of the National Assembly, as the government relies on the confidence of the French Parliament.
